# Firehose

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of {Firehose} is to help analysts reduce the time they spend authoring reports, and increase the time available for analysis.

## Installation

You can install this package from GitHub as follows:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("https://github.com/ThomUK/Firehose")

# Load the package
library(Firehose)
```
